koohiiStory1: I think of an anti-hero (Dirty Harry etc.) for this primitive, whose trademark for disposing of villians is not an honorable fight, but a kick in the crotch and then a shove off a cliff (perhaps whilst the villain´s back is turned).
koohiiStory2: Many cultures are so anti-sex you´d think they just want people to throw their crotches over a cliff.
kunYomi: そ.る、そ.らす、かえ.す、かえ.る、-かえ.る
myStory: chống lại. bẻ cong. nhét việc thêm dưới mái xéo
readingExamples: 反映 (はんえい), 反対 (はんたい), 違反 (いはん), 謀反 (むほん), 反らす (そ.らす), 反る (そ.る)
words: roll of cloth (c. 10 yds.), .245 acres, 300 tsubo
to be inconsistent with, to oppose, to contradict, to transgress, to rebel
change, turn over, turn upside down
opposition, resistance, insubordination, defiance, hostility, rebellion
